articleContentTranslated: Austria's NBA pioneers scored double digits for the second time in a row and for the third time in the game year. The 25-year-old Viennese scored eleven points, seven rebounds, three blocks and one assist.

For a long time it was a duel between equals that the teams fought at the Moda Center on the Willamette River. The Texans mostly had slight advantages before they took out the highest lead up to then with 95:82 at the beginning of the final section.

In Monday's second top game, the Brooklyn Nets prevailed in their home game against the Milwaukee Bucks with 125: 123.
James Harden, who had just moved from the Houston Rockets to New York in a spectacular move last week, scored 34 points and twelve assists for the hosts.
